com.devproserv.courses.dao

Class CourseDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devproserv.courses.dao.CourseDao

  • public class CourseDao
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for communication between application and the database and manipulates with table 'courses'. Part of DAO design pattern.
    Author:
    vovas11
    See Also:
    Course, DaoFactory

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CourseDao(javax.sql.DataSource datasrc) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Course> getAvailableCourses(User user)
      Executes request into the database and returns list of courses that are available for the current student to subscribe.
      java.util.List<Course> getSubscribedCourses(User user)
      Executes request into the database for getting the courses that a student has been subscribed to
      void insertUserCourse(User user, Course course)
      Executes request into the database (table 'student_courses') to insert the current user and course.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public CourseDao(javax.sql.DataSource datasrc)

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableCourses

        public java.util.List<Course> getAvailableCourses(User user)
        Executes request into the database and returns list of courses that are available for the current student to subscribe.
        Parameters:
        user - the current user
        Returns:
        list of available courses from the database

      • getSubscribedCourses

        public java.util.List<Course> getSubscribedCourses(User user)
        Executes request into the database for getting the courses that a student has been subscribed to
        Parameters:
        user - the current user
        Returns:
        list of subscribed courses for the user

      • insertUserCourse

        public void insertUserCourse(User user,
                             Course course)
        Executes request into the database (table 'student_courses') to insert the current user and course. In other words, the current user subscribes to the current course
        Parameters:
        user - the current user
        course - the current course
